commit.message:
Auto merge of #76848 - RalfJung:miri, r=RalfJung

update Miri

Let's get https://github.com/rust-lang/miri/pull/1540 shipped.
Fixes https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76968.
Cc `@rust-lang/miri` r? `@ghost`
